This is a post to explain what is done in the online dashboard to simulate the 
a biological reactor.

This code was developed in Python and the dashboard was created using Shiny for Python.

The online simulation tool is available in [this website](https://envbioprom.shinyapps.io/bioreactor-dashboard/)
